 TIDS 'n BITS 
 Considered a Holy Grail among the Hermes leather family, Box leather is extremely rare to find – and even more so in the Birkin bag. 
 Named after Joseph Box, a British shoe craftsman during the 1890s.  Its remarkable smooth texture gains a beautiful patina over time, and its studier composition retains the shape of the Birkin and Kelly bags.  When carrying your bag the leather will reflect either as matte or reveal its gorgeous glossy finish – depending on the light. 
 Hermes considers the true beauty of the leather to unfold with use and the eventual patina.  The markings you will gain with usage will blend, and lighter markings can be buffed to diminish.  Mr. Dumas once said that each bag has a story.  And by that he referred to the markings on leather with use.  Box leather will allow to recall those life moments making this a most special piece in your wardrobe.    This remarkable leather is also easily restored at the Hermes Spa.  However, always carry your raincoat in your bag, as water is not friendly to Box leather. 
 From brand new, to gaining her character, a Box leather bag will always exude iconic sophistication.
